title: Bananas in pyjamas: Wish fairies
creator_credit: Di Drew, Paul Faint, Tammy Burnstock, Virginia Lumsden and ABC-TV (Australia)
brief_description: B1 and B2 dress up as Wish Fairies so that they can secretly make wishes come true for the Teddies. Meanwhile the Rat in the Hat discovers the fairies and schemes to catch them so he can sell the wishes in his shop. Includes five other Bananas in Pyjamas stories.
